Install
=======

Install from `PyPI`_ with ``pip``:

.. code-block:: bash

    $ pip install django-edit-suggestion

.. _pypi: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-edit-suggestion/

Settings
~~~~~~~~

Add ``django_edit_suggestion`` to your ``INSTALLED_APPS``

.. code-block:: python

    INSTALLED_APPS = [
        # ...
        'django_edit_suggestion',
    ]
